attrs.script:
echo "Bootstrapping: with IP Address: @@{NginxService.address}@@"

cd ~/chef-repo/
knife bootstrap "@@{NginxService.address}@@" --ssh-user @@{nutanix.username}@@ --ssh-password '@@{nutanix.secret}@@' --sudo --use-sudo-password --node-name "@@{NginxService.name}@@" --environment @@{environment}@@ --run-list 'role[@@{chefRole}@@]'

echo "Bootrap of @@{NginxService.name}@@ Complete."

echo "Deleting Chef client @@{calm_application_name}@@"

cd ~/chef-repo/
knife client delete @@{nginxName}@@ -y

echo "Delete of client @@{calm_application_name}@@ Complete."

echo "Deleting Chef Node @@{calm_application_name}@@"

cd ~/chef-repo/
knife node delete @@{nginxName}@@ -y

echo "Delete of Node @@{calm_application_name}@@ Complete."

action_list.name: action_install
